title: Fighting Dirty
description: There’s nothing I wouldn’t do for my best friend.Like, hide the fact I’ve been in love with her for years.Or agree to be her fake boyfriend when we have to return to her hometown for her exes wedding.Little does Jillian know this is what I’ve been waiting for.It’s a dream come true. I finally get to touch her and love her in all the ways I’ve been dying to show her.For one weekend only, she’s mine, even if she thinks it’s fake.Pretending to love her is easy.I want her to be mine forever.Getting Jillian to admit it’s what she wants too, is another thing. On or off the ice, I have no problems fighting dirty to get what I want. But this is one fight I might just lose.
author: Stacey Lynn
